QuestionJSON.Question: Harley and their friends are designing a computer program that simulates a volleyball game. They are all assigned different roles in the team. Which of the following is a role that Harley would NOT have in this project?
QuestionJSON.Answer1: Coding the physics of the volleyball
QuestionJSON.Answer3: Drawing up the plans for the volleyball court
QuestionJSON.Answer4: Baking cookies for the team's snack breaks
QuestionJSON.Explanation: While baking cookies could be a fun and appreciated activity for the team, it isn't a role involved in designing or developing the computational artifact of a volleyball game simulation.
